title: Hell Yeah 25 chat ban restriction 0 honor. Love it.
body:
So i never used to get chat restrictions in this game probably because i was buying so many skins back then (2015). I get a little irritated when I have to deal with trolls game after game after game. Every game its either someone feeding or someone trying to Leoana top lane or Warwick support, but as of now im done supporting this game not going to chat to anyone anymore or buy Riot Points.

This is what got me banned. Not one curse word used and i didnt spam.

You can respond, you just have to make sure that your response isn't negative (i.e. flaming, name-calling or harassment). Some examples of neutral chat would be "ziggs flashless", "nami mia", "careful, jungler has blue buff" or "tribrush warded by bot laner". You can even say "please stop trolling" in response to someone trolling (just say it once or twice though and don't keep on about it) or "no need to start flaming. ashe just got backup at the last second" in response to someone flaming. These are things that are neutral and game-related and more importantly won't get you punished. If that's still too much to ask of you then just don't bother responding.

P.S. Calling for reports as a leaping off point to harass someone is considered a reportable offense.
